description.ko: 심연을 고향으로 삼는 기묘하고 아름다운 생명체들이 내뿜는 빛만이 유일한 길잡이가 되어주는, 바다의 가장 깊고 어두운 곳으로의 여정입니다.
description.en: A journey into the darkest reaches of the ocean, where the only light comes from the strange and beautiful creatures that call the abyss home.

prompt: Ultra-realistic cinematic shot of the deep ocean floor, 8k resolution, bioluminescent flora and fauna glowing in neon blues and purples, hydrothermal vents emitting ethereal smoke, mysterious ancient structures partially buried in the silt, high contrast, atmospheric lighting, deep sea exploration aesthetic, wide angle lens.
